Name: Blogify
Description: Creating blogs has never been more fun. With Blogify you can not only compose blogs, you also have the options to like and comment on blogs which pique your interest.  View the vast collection of blogs from bloggers around the world.

Name: Books 'R' Us
Description: Are you are bookwarm?  Come check out the catalog of books that Books 'R' Us has to offer.  Discoverd a new book you like?  Add it the catalog and share it with your friends.

Name: Patient Tracker
Description: Does your health organization need a patient record management tool that's easy to use and reliable?  I invite you to try out Patient Tracker and streamline your patient record responsibilities.

Name: Repo Rater
Description: Rating repositories couldn't be any more fun. Come browse the collection of GitHub repositories from a variety of developers and let them know how you feel about their projects.
